Article text: A Calamitous Elopement   is a 1908 American  silent   short   comedy film  directed by  D  W  Griffith   A print of the film exists in the film archive of the  Library of Congress     1       A young couple decides to elope after being caught in the midst of a romantic moment by the woman s angry father  They make plans to leave  but a thief discovers their plans and hides in their trunk and waits for the right moment to steal their belongings
